title: Prince Harry and Ed Sheeran in 'gingers unite' video for World Mental Health Day
text:
Prince Harry and Ed Sheeran have joined forces to raise awareness on World Mental Health Day.

In a video posted on the Sussex's official Instagram, the singer-songwriter and the duke are seen discussing an issue that is close to both their hearts.

The video starts with Sheeran having a beard trim before he rings Prince Harry's doorbell, which chimes to the tune of God Save The Queen.

As they discuss their collaborative project, it becomes clear that wires have been crossed and the pair are talking about very different things.

Sheeran, having said he has prepared a song, can be seen deleting the title "Gingers Unite" from his laptop as Prince Harry points out he is talking about World Mental Health Day.

Watch the video here:
description: Prince Harry and Ed Sheeran have joined forces to raise awareness on World Mental Health Day.
